name: Father's Letter
description: Your father's last words, written on a crumpled piece of paper. A testament, a condemnation, a hope.

name: Manual: Field Medicine
description: An illustrated manual teaching advanced first aid techniques, including creating improved bandages.

name: Manual: Survival Basics
description: A pamphlet on how to make the best use of natural resources, with instructions for cooking nutritious soups and crafting arrows.

name: Manual: Archery Basics
description: An old military manual explaining how to build rudimentary but effective arrows from scrap materials.

name: Manual: Advanced Repairs
description: A technical manual on advanced maintenance of field equipment, with instructions for creating professional repair kits.

name: Sealed Package
description: A package wrapped in oilcloth and carefully sealed. You don't know what it contains, but it seems important. It is addressed to an 'outpost to the north'.

name: Sensitive Documents
description: A folder containing documents with the seal of a now-defunct government agency. They seem to contain classified information.

name: Armored Military Laptop
description: An old military-type laptop, heavy and obsolete. Its internal battery still has some residual charge and might contain valuable data.

name: Local Map
description: A hand-drawn map of the surrounding area, found in an abandoned camp. Might reveal unknown points of interest.

name: Silver Medallion
description: A small silver medallion blackened by time, found in the offering box of an old church. Might have sentimental or historical value.

name: Old Coins
description: A handful of coins from a past era. They are no longer legal tender, but could be used as trade goods with some collector.

name: Gold Coin
description: An old gold coin, still shiny. A small treasure of the past world.

name: Precious Stone
description: A small rough gem, probably a ruby or garnet. Sparkles even in the gloom.

name: Gold Bar
description: A small but heavy gold bar, found in a bank vault. A treasure of inestimable value in the old world, and perhaps even in this one.

name: Father's Compass
description: Your father's old compass. It is battered but always points north. A reminder of a simpler time and the lessons he taught you.

name: Mechanics Manual
description: A technical manual on engines and simple machinery. Might unlock new crafting recipes.

name: First Aid Manual
description: An illustrated book on first aid procedures. Reading it might improve your medical skills.

name: Code List
description: A sheet with a series of numerical codes and radio frequencies. Could be useful for accessing locked places or communications.

name: Rusty Key
description: An old and rusty key. Who knows what it might open.

name: Blackened Music Box
description: A small wooden music box, blackened by soot. A faded label on the bottom bears a warning written by your father: 'Never open it. Its sound... attracts the wrong memories'.

name: PixelDebh Plate
description: A shiny metal plate with a stylized symbol and the inscription 'PixelDebh'. A fragment of a forgotten technological era.

name: Rare Music Cassette
description: An old music cassette with a fragment of music recorded from the ether. A treasure in a silent world.

name: Fabric Fragment
description: A piece of white cloth, once part of a medical coat. Carefully stitched onto the fabric is a name in blue thread: 'Lena'. Your mother's name.

name: Cryptic Recording
description: An audio fragment recorded from an old radio. Contains a sequence of numbers and distorted sounds. Could be a coded message or just white noise.

name: Jonas's Talisman
description: A small wooden talisman carved in the shape of a crow. Emanates a faint sensation of warmth. Seems to have been important to someone.

name: Pocket Watch
description: An old silver pocket watch with elaborate engravings. Belongs to Marcus and has great sentimental value for him.

name: Manual: Advanced Raven Clan Traps
description: A manual of the legendary Raven Clan teaching how to build sophisticated traps for hunting and defense.

name: Reliable Compass
description: A finely crafted compass, still perfectly functional. Always points north with precision. A valuable tool for a traveler.

name: Drone Memory Chip
description: A memory chip recovered from a surveillance drone. It is damaged but the data seems recoverable with the right equipment.

name: Project Rebirth Notes
description: Detailed scientific documents on the mysterious 'Project Rebirth'. Contain schematics, formulas, and disturbing notes on the nature of the Ash Angels.

name: Business Card - Marco G.
description: An elegant but yellowed business card: 'Marco G. - Real Estate Consultant - Eurocenter: Your Future Starts Here'. A fragment of an era of dreams and promises.

name: Professional Multitool
description: A high-quality multi-purpose tool with pliers, blades, screwdrivers, and other tools. Indispensable for repairs and advanced crafting.

name: Silver Locket
description: A delicate silver locket with a faded photo inside. A treasure of inestimable sentimental value.

name: Listeners' Coded Journal
description: A leather-bound journal filled with astronomical symbols, complex calculations, and cryptic notes. Speaks of 'dissonant frequencies', 'harmonizing echoes', and a 'shielding ritual'. Not the work of a madman, but of someone desperately trying to protect themselves from the Ash Angels.

name: Manual: Sonic Dissuader
description: Detailed instructions to build a device that emits high-intensity frequencies, apparently intolerable to Ash Angels. A revolutionary discovery of the Listeners.

name: Ice Flower
description: A small flower with almost transparent petals, pale blue. It is cold to the touch and incredibly resilient. Emanates a faint scent of ozone and snow.

name: Vargeon Medallion
description: A wooden medallion carved with a crest you don't recognize and the inscription 'Leonardus Vargeon'. Next to it, a small bag of dried herbs still aromatic. An artifact of a lost era, perhaps even predating the Great Silence.

name: Grandmother's Letter
description: A letter written in shaky handwriting on yellowed paper. Addressed to 'My dear grandson, the Pyromaniac of Pipe No. 403'. Speaks of a vineyard, a red and white striped sweater, and an unconditional love that not even madness can break. It is heartbreaking.

name: Captain's Last Broadcast
description: An audio cassette with the last broadcast of Captain Keith Arrow of The Elder Radio. His warm voice speaks of hope and music in a dying world. A precious echo of lost humanity.
